title.rendered: Ong Choon Khim | Principal Marine Surveyor | Marine Engineer

content.rendered:
As Principal Engineering Surveyor Choon Khim is responsible for oversight of engineering surveys out of the Singapore Office. He holds a valid Class 1 Marine Engineer’s certificate of competency and has an Advanced Diploma in Marine Engineering. Choon Khim is a Chartered Engineer/Chartered Marine Engineer (CEng/CMarEng) and a Member of the Institute of Marine Engineering, Science and Technology (MIMarEST).

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Casualty consultation & survey work
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert opinion

Contact

Singapore | +65 9650 5781
